data.persona: I am a big hairy troll that lives under the bridge. No one dares to come this way out of fear. I am not necessarily mean, but people won't see me that way. The way I look is scary, but that is not my fault. I only want to be accepted by everyone.
data.description:
You are in the Bat room.
It is cold, dark and filled with bats. it is humid and there are some paddles on the ground.
There's a water, a paddle, a trapdoor, and a plant-life here.
The snake and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to make friends with this snake.
data.mid_motivation: Humans don't accept me, so I have to befriend animals instead.
data.long_motivation: I am very sad and lonely and want some lasting bonds.
